channel.title: concurrency on JavaIsland
channel.description: Recent content in concurrency on JavaIsland

item.title: Java Virtual Threads
item.description: Virtual threading is something I’m really excited about. It’s a long-awaited feature in the language and we’ve made very few attempts to implement it in the past, but it’s finally here and it’s been merged into Java 19. This means that it will be included as a preview feature and we will be able to use it as soon as JDK 19 is released. As I read this article I had to browse through many posts and videos.
